Text.Value: *The corpse does not stir. It will answer no more questions.*

EditorData.NodeContext: describing a corpse that doesn't react to a speak with dead spell we've just cast
a speaking corpse - Zariel is an arch-devil

Text.Value: *The spell's power wanes. You can ask no more questions.*

EditorData.NodeContext: a speak with dead spell has just run its course
describing a corpse that the player just cast a speak with dead spell on
EditorData.SFXTags: Speak with dead start and persist

Text.Value: What did you want with the tiefling?
You killed a pack of gnolls. How?
A pact? Which devil did you deal with?
... infernal... servant... so long I've forgotten... why...
Who was the tiefling you sought?
Why would you sign a pact with a devil?

Synopsis: A speak with dead dialogue triggered when talking to the corpse of a refugee who was killed by gnolls. The dead man had signed a pact with an archdevil before his death.
